entry.title: ‘Buy Bitcoin’ Notepad Held Behind Janet Yellen Sells for $1M
entry.summary: The iconic sign was held before cameras during a televised House Financial Services Committee hearing in 2017.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Slips Below $64,000 as $209 Million in Crypto Longs Liquidated
entry.summary: The market slump saw over $209 million in crypto long positions liquidated, with over $52 million in Bitcoin longs liquidated.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs See $120 Million Outflows, BlackRock's IBIT Ends 71-Day Inflow Streak
entry.summary: BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust saw zero inflows yesterday, after scraping into the top 10 ETFs with the longest daily inflow streaks.

entry.title: Bitcoin Runes Transactions Are Taking Over the Network—And Dominating BRC-20
entry.summary: The popular DOG collection helped Runes claim 81% of all transactions on the Bitcoin network Tuesday, Dune reports.

entry.title: This Ultra Light AI Model Fits on Your Phone and Can Beat ChatGPT
entry.summary: Microsoft's latest “small language model” is well-suited to specific needs, offering cost-effective performance in a compact package.

entry.title: Bitcoin Wallets Holding At Least $1K Are Growing in 'Positive Trend': Fidelity
entry.summary: The amount of Bitcoin held on exchanges, meanwhile, fell 30% in the first quarter to 2.3 million BTC

entry.title: What's Next for Notcoin? Becoming the 'Netflix of Social, Viral Games'
entry.summary: The team behind viral Telegram-based game Notcoin is racing to create a sustainable ecosystem of similar, interconnected experiences from third-party developers.

entry.title: Interview: Hot 'Notcoin' Will Evolve After the NOT Token Launch
entry.summary: Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov speaks with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about how he envisions Notcoin's expansion and evolution after the token drop—into something akin to the "Netflix of social, viral games."

entry.title: Bitcoin Meme Coin DOG Hits $336 Million Market Cap After Runes Airdrop
entry.summary: DOG•GO•TO•THE•MOON (aka DOG) was airdropped to Ordinals holders Wednesday, immediately becoming the most widely-held Bitcoin Runes token.

entry.title: Feds Arrest Founders of Bitcoin Mixer Samourai Wallet
entry.summary: The DOJ has “once again criminalized the developers of an app that restores financial privacy,” protested Edward Snowden.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Hype Cooling, But BTC Will Still Hit $150,000: Standard Chartered
entry.summary: The leading UK-based bank says it is still bullish on Bitcoin, holding firm on its bold price prediction.

entry.title: Bitcoin’s Inflation Rate Is Now Lower Than Gold: Report
entry.summary: Meanwhile, analysts say the latest halving is symbolically significant but unlikely to have a noticeable price impact.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey's Square Will Convert Shops' Revenue to Bitcoin via Cash App
entry.summary: Jack Dorsey's Square platform is allowing businesses to automatically convert a portion of their sales into Bitcoin with a new feature.

entry.title: Play-to-Earn 'Puffverse' Migrating to Ethereum Gaming Network Ronin From BNB Chain
entry.summary: Puffverse has raised $3 million in a round led by Animoca Brands, with plans to shift to Ronin and launch a party game, token, and new NFTs.

entry.title: Solana Dog Coins Have Their Day as BONK and WIF Post Big Price Gains
entry.summary: Major Solana meme coins BONK and WIF are on fire, posting considerable jumps in the last 24 hours despite the broader market correction.

entry.title: Terra Founder Do Kwon Files Extradition Appeal, Calls Out 'Bizarre' Legal Readings From Court
entry.summary: Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon filed a fresh appeal in his Montenegrin legal saga, accusing a court of "bizarre" legal interpretations.

entry.title: Ethereum Card Game 'The Lost Glitches' Coming to Layer-3 Network Xai
entry.summary: The Xai Foundation is teaming up with and investing with Ethereum NFT card battler The Lost Glitches to bring it to the Arbitrum-based network.

entry.title: Hedera Jumps 113% Amid BlackRock Confusion
entry.summary: HBAR skyrocketed after an announcement that name-dropped BlackRock, but the price is now falling as the investment giant says it's not directly involved.

entry.title: Magic Runes
entry.summary: BTC stables at $66k, liquidations in narrow range. BTC funding again turns negative in bullish sign. ETFs net inflow after Grayscale moves to lower fees. BTC demand 5x vs supply post-halving: Bitfinex. SOL congestion issue now largely solved. Two SEC lawyers resign after ‘gross abuse of power’. Ripple fights to lower $2bn SEC fine. SAFE trades at $2.8bn FDV after OKX lists. MANEKI hits $150m on first day, China memes pump. Memecoins are ‘black hole you can’t ignore’. DeGods up 20%, may switch back to SOL. Magic Eden launches Runes platform ahead of time. Louis Vuitton gifts Pharrell jacket to NFT holders. Melania Trump launches necklace with SOL NFTs. Hoodie Punk trades for $620K.

entry.title: BlackRock, Grayscale Amend Ethereum ETF Applications After SEC Delays
entry.summary: The flurry of filings follows the SEC's announcement yesterday that it would delay its decision on multiple spot Ethereum ETF proposals.

entry.title: XOCIETY Brings AAA Gaming to Web3 With Sui
entry.summary: Palo Alto, CA, April 24th, 2024, GamingWire Web3 Gaming is evolving, and in a significant move, XOCIETY, one of Web3’s most anticipated games, is partnering with Mysten Labs, the original contributor to Sui, an innovative Layer 1 and smart contract platform. XOCIETY and Mysten Labs will work together to revolutionize gaming in the Web3 […]

entry.title: Tevaera Secures $5M Funding to Redefine Gaming
entry.summary: Participating investors include Hashkey Capital, Fenbushi Capital, Matter Labs, Draper Dragon, Faculty Group and Crypto.com Capital.

entry.title: Hong Kong Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs to Begin Trading April 30
entry.summary: Trading for Hong Kong’s spot crypto ETFs will begin April 30, after the securities regulator formally signed off on their approval.

entry.title: What Is Xai? The Rising Ethereum Layer-3 Gaming Network on Arbitrum
entry.summary: Xai is an Arbitrum-based layer-3 gaming network for Ethereum, powered by the XAI token after a sizable airdrop. Here's what you need to know.

entry.title: US Department of Justice Seeks 3-Year Jail Sentence for Former Binance CEO CZ
entry.summary: Citing Changpeng Zhao's "willful violation of U.S. law," the DoJ recommended a harsher-than-expected for the former Binance CEO.

entry.title: AI Assistant Users Could Develop An ‘Emotional Attachment’ to Them, Google Warns
entry.summary: With great power comes great responsibility, and one of the largest providers of AI assistants says they are becoming quite powerful.

entry.title: Why Are Bitcoin Rune Names So Weird? There's a Method to the Madness
entry.summary: Despite quirky and long labels, there are already several thousand etchings in the wake of the Bitcoin halving.

entry.title: Google, Meta, OpenAI Unite With Other Industry Giants Against AI Child Abuse Imagery
entry.summary: A coalition of high-powered players pledges to prioritize child safety in all phases of AI development.

entry.title: 'Space Nation Online' Preview: Ethereum Game's Promising Beta Plagued by Server Issues
entry.summary: The voice acting and graphics shine in Space Nation Online's test, but server hitches tied to airdrop demand keep popping up.

entry.title: IRS Set to Kill Pseudonymity in Crypto? Tax Form Proposal Raises Alarms
entry.summary: A draft of an IRS form appears to indicate that the agency will require self-custodial wallet addresses from DeFi users filing taxes.

entry.title: Luxury Watches, Designer Shoes Will Soon Trade Like NFTs: Arianee CEO
entry.summary: Arianee CEO Pierre-Nicolas Hurstel sat down with Rug Radio founder Farokh and Decrypt’s Sander Lutz at NFT Paris to discuss everything from the future of on-chain luxury to the secret hack to finding the best restaurants in France.

entry.title: Bitcoin Proposal to Restore Satoshi Code Gets a '420' Update
entry.summary: OP_CAT, which could enable advanced functionality on Bitcoin, was introduced as BIP-420 by Taproot Wizards co-founder Udi Wertheimer.

entry.title: Venezuela Turns to Tether to Skirt US Oil Sanctions: Report
entry.summary: Amid election turmoil, state-run oil firm PDVSA is using USDT. But Tether vows to follow the law and block transactions.

entry.title: Notcoin's Co-Creator Explains the Game's Token Delay—And When to Expect NOT Now
entry.summary: Notcoin co-creator Sasha Plotvinov spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai to discuss why the NOT token launch was pushed back from the original 4/20 target, when to expect the listing, and more.

entry.title: TON’s Justin Hyun Breaks Down The Importance of USDT Coming to Telegram
entry.summary: At Token 2049 in Dubai, The Open Network’s director of investments sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz to discuss what he sees as the game-changing integration of USDT onto TON, and his plans for getting Telegram’s 900 million users to start using crypto in the immediate future.

entry.title: Crypto Influencer Ansem Explains His Meme Coin Thesis and Why He’s Bullish on Bitcoin Runes
entry.summary: Ansem, the crypto trader who's amassed a sizable following on the back of meme coin Dogwifhat (WIF) and other calls, chats with Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about his meme coin thesis, why he's bullish on Bitcoin Runes, and what he sees ahead for the crypto markets.

entry.title: Decrypt's Sander Lutz Braves the Dubai Floods for a Crypto Conference
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz reports from Dubai amid a historic storm that flooded the famed city, trudging through the streets to complete his essential task: Attending the Token 2049 crypto conference.

entry.title: Gold Beats Its All Time High
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) maintains its trend of reaching higher lows amidst choppy market conditions. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness another influx of $125 million. There's anticipation of Hong Kong approving ETFs for both Bitcoin and Ethereum (ETH) come Monday. Notable institutional investor BlackRock shows interest in Bitcoin. Recent filings reveal increased Bitcoin purchases by banks. A Bitcoin-friendly political party secures victory in the South Korean election. Analyst Kang predicts Bitcoin could surge to $80-100k by May. Meanwhile, Ethereum sees accumulation by stablecoin whales on the rise. A new Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) aims to streamline signing requests. Solana (SOL) experiences a resurgence in activity, reaching yearly highs.

entry.title: NASA’s Next Deep Space Mission Won’t Use Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: On Thursday, Decrypt Media visited NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Pasadena, CA to meet with the Engineering team behind the Europa Clipper before its launch to Jupiter's Europa moon in October.

entry.title: We Do A Little with Weesh
entry.summary: In this week’s episode, we did a little something different. We took the man who is usually behind the camera and put him in front of it. We sat down with our producer Weesh to dive into how in fell in love with art and became a collector, how he met Andy and fun childhood memories together, his biggest wins in crypto, and so much more.

entry.title: Inside VanEck’s Crypto Takeover of the New York Stock Exchange
entry.summary: Worlds collide as Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz heads to the floor of the NYSE to witness a special closing bell ceremony hosted by VanEck in honor of Web3. Featuring Choose Rich Nick, VanEck Head of Web3 Matt Bartlett, and more!

entry.title: Wormhole Wednesday
entry.summary: BTC hits $64.5K then rebounds, SOL outperforms. Government sends $2B BTC to Coinbase to sell. Funding rates stay low after sweep lower. ETFs see small inflow, Ark outflow more than GBTC. Wormhole W launches at $15B FDV. BTC ‘inflection point’ if it follows rates or gold. Gold & BTC very correlated for the last year. Expect slower ETF volume this month: Bloomberg. BTC 2x and 3x levered ETFs launch yesterday. BTC ETFs now half the size of gold.

entry.title: First Dogs, Now Cats
entry.summary: BTC falls another 6% amid $400m liquidations. ETF outflows and dollar strength blamed for move. Funding completely reset to lows in move. BTC lower high leaves market in ‘no trade zone’. This cycle acting ‘nothing like previous cycle’. ETH unlikely to be classed a security: Coinbase CFO. Crypto VC funding up 53% in MarchAnsem’s cat coin sees more volume than NFT market. Most memecoins down 10-20% given move in majors. MEW up 10% after HTX lists, airdrop to Saga phones. MEME to launch memecoin chain, NFTs rise. Pixelmon releases trailer for Anime series.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Spencer Gordon-Sand
entry.summary:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Spencer Gordon Sand, the mastermind behind Spencer Ventures. Before launching Spencer Ventures, Spencer was a competitive fencer, Magic the gathering player, and startup enjoyooor.
We dive into Spencer’s investment thesis behind NFTs and how his fund invests, finding and buying distressed assets in a bear market , point farming optimization, a peak behind the 3AC liquidation and dickbutt buys, and so much more.

entry.title: How To Get Your Foot In Ihe Door And Building During Bear Markets
entry.summary:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Intern and Tunez from the Monad team. Prior to Monad, Tunez was working with Delphi Digital and Intern was working at CMS Holdings. They’re two of my oldest friends from crypto twitter.
We get into why they joined the Monad team, alpha for finding jobs in the space, biggest lessons from previous cycles, and so much more.

entry.title: SBF Sentencing
entry.summary: BTC: 70.7k (+1%), ETH: 3585 (0%), SOL: 186 (-1%). Top 100 gainers: DOGE, GT, BCH, RBN. Crypto mixed, BTC-beta & memes outperform. SEC case vs Coinbase set to go to trial. DeFi win as case dismissed vs Coinbase wallet. ETFs see $244m inflows led by Ark. BlackRock ETF fastest growing in history: Fink. ETH ETF possible even if its a security: Fink. ETH spot ETF by May chances only 20%: GSR. SBF sentencing today, faces 50 years.

entry.title: The $63 Million Exploit
entry.summary: BTC consolidates around $70k, funding still low. ETFs see $418m inflow as GBTC outflow tiny. BTC set to have record 7th-straight green month. AI coins soar, FET hits ATH amid merger rumour. FET, OCEAN, AGIX token proposed at $7.5bn FDV. DoJ charges KuCoin over money laundering. KuCoin sees $800m outflows after charges. CFTC names ETH & LTC commodities in charges. HK set to allow ‘in-kind’ style ETFs. HSBC launches tokenised gold fund. Fidelity files S1 form for ETH ETF. Short sellers bet $11bn crypto rally won’t last. More customer USDC balances to be stored on Base.

entry.title: BTC Is Back On Top
entry.summary: BTC breaks $70K as $175M of shorts liquidated. ETFs see net inflow despite high GBTC outflows. Gold miner set to buy $1.7B BTC. UK to list crypto ETNs in May. ETH ETF may still be approved: Grayscale. Grayscale ETH discount falls to 22%. ETH ETF has no positive signs: Bloomberg. Coinbase pumps 10%, Ark continue to sell shares. Coinbase Int. record trading volumes in March. FTX to sell majority of Anthropic stake for $884M. Trader makes $20m profit in MEW rally. Puppets hit ATH, lead move higher in Ordinals. Azuki flips MAYC market cap in bounce. Magic Eden makes $15m in 30d trading revenue.

entry.title: Base On Top
entry.summary: Majors continue to rally as ETF sentiment improves. Genesis have likely sold half their GBTC position. BlackRock could flip GBTC holdings in 3 weeks. BTC short squeeze would liquidate $6.6bn by $75k. Lack of on-chain activity indicates ‘limited selling’. BTC crucial to the financial system: BlackRock. Resurging interest in crypto assets: Goldman Sachs. Crypto summer has started: Raoul Pal. Base outpaces SOL & ETH for trading volumes.
